attribute.description: An el expression referring to a server side UIComponent instance in a backing bean.
attribute.name: binding

attribute.description: By default, panels can be folded by clicking the title bar. Seting collapsible to false will suppress the collapse/expand feature.
attribute.name: collapsible

attribute.description: contentClass is optional: if specified, the content will be displayed with this specific class
attribute.name: contentClass

attribute.description: Inline style of the content area.
attribute.name: contentStyle

attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a namingContainer.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Look of the Panel, can be primary, success, info, warning, danger. Default is warning.
attribute.name: look

attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false component will not be rendered.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: Inline style of the entire panel area.
attribute.name: style

attribute.description: Style class of the input element.
attribute.name: styleClass

attribute.description: Title is optional: if specified, the heading facet will not be rendered and the panel will render with a heading with this Title.
attribute.name: title

attribute.description: TitleClass is optional: if specified, the title will be displayed with this specific class
attribute.name: titleClass

attribute.description: Inline style of the title area.
attribute.name: titleStyle

attribute.description: The tooltip is shown and hidden with a delay. This value is the delay in milliseconds. Defaults to 0 (no delay).
attribute.name: tooltipDelay

attribute.description: The tooltip is hidden with a delay. This value is the delay in milliseconds. Defaults to 0 (no delay).
attribute.name: tooltipDelayHide

attribute.description: The tooltip is shown with a delay. This value is the delay in milliseconds. Defaults to 0 (no delay).
attribute.name: tooltipDelayShow

attribute.description: Where is the tooltip to be displayed? Possible values: "top", "bottom", "right", "left", "auto", "auto top", "auto bottom", "auto right" and "auto left". Default to "bottom".
attribute.name: tooltipPosition
